subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Marcel Granollers on Saturday became the 14th player to retire from this year’s United States Open, an unheard-of number in a season already marked by a rise in retirements.
snippet: Marcel Granollers on Saturday became the 14th player to retire from this year’s United States Open, an unheard-of number in a season already marked by a rise in retirements.
